content: You have to be brave to be an actor. It's not easy to perform on stage in front of a lot of people. I am too shy for that.
translations: ita:Devi essere coraggioso per essere un attore. Non Ã¨ facile esibirsi sul palco davanti a molte persone. Sono troppo timido
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
